endpoint.name: formular-log
endpoint.config: CREATE SCHEMA formular AUTHORIZATION SA CREATE TABLE formular.log ( created timestamp, formular varchar(255) NOT NULL, sessionid varchar(255), ip varchar(255), type varchar(255), name varchar(255), message varchar(4096), obj varchar(10000))

datasource.name: formular-log
datasource.sql: select * from formular.log order by created DESC

insert into formular.log(created, formular, sessionid, ip, type, name, message, obj) values ( [timestamp: SystemTime()], [string: log.formular], [string: log.sessionid], [string: log.ip], [string: log.type], [string: log.name], [string: log.message], [string: log.obj])
